anya-e0105n1:1: 1. Tattha hi tena dhammānandena ‘‘buddhaghoso bodhimaṇḍasamīpe (buddhagayāyaṁ) jātoti na yuttameta’’nti vatvā taṁsādhanatthāya cattāri byatirekakāraṇāni dassitāni. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n1:2_0: (Ka) ‘‘buddhaghosena pakāsitesu taṁkālikavatthūsu ekampi taṁ natthi, yaṁ magadhesu
anya-e0105n1:2_1: uppanna’’nti paṭhamaṁ kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Tadakāraṇameva. Ācariyabuddhaghosatthero
anya-e0105n1:2_2: hi saṅgahaṭṭhakathāyo karonto porāṇaṭṭhakathāyoyeva saṁkhipitvā, bhāsāparivattanamattena
anya-e0105n1:2_3: ca visesetvā akāsi, na pana yaṁ vā taṁ vā attano diṭṭhasutaṁ dassetvā. Vuttañhetaṁ ācariyena –
anya-e0105n1:10: Saṁvaṇṇanaṁ samma samārabhissa’’nti pārā. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n1:18: Sakkacca tasmā anusikkhitabbā’’ti pārā. aṭṭha. 1.ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n1:19_0: Yatheva ca ācariyabuddhaghosena attano aṭṭhakathāsu taṁkālikāni māgadhikāni vatthūni
anya-e0105n1:19_1: na pakāsitāni, tatheva sīhaḷikānipi dakkhiṇaindiyaraṭṭhikānipi. Na hi tattha vasabharājakālato
anya-e0105n1:19_3: pārā. aṭṭha. 2.236-237, ācariyo ca tato tisatamattavassehi pacchātare mahānāmarañño
anya-e0105n1:19_5: appakāsanamattena na sakkā takkattā na māgadhikoti ñātunti.
anya-e0105n1:20_1: diṭṭhassa viya pakāsanaṁ natthī’’ti dutiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Tassapi akāraṇabhāvo
anya-e0105n1:20_2: purimavacaneneva veditabbo. Apica sāratthappakāsiniyā nāma saṁyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṁ,
anya-e0105n1:20_3: sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā nāma dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyañca vuttasaṁvaṇṇanāyapi veditabbo. Tattha hi –
anya-e0105n1:21_0: ‘‘Yatheva hi kalambanadītīrato rājamātuvihāradvārena thūpārāmaṁ gantabbaṁ hoti, evaṁ
anya-e0105n1:21_1: hiraññavatikāya nāma nadiyā pārimatīrato sālavanaṁ uyyānaṁ. Yathā anurādhapurassa
anya-e0105n1:21_2: thūpārāmo, evaṁ taṁ kusinārāya hoti. Thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṁ pavisanamaggo
anya-e0105n1:21_3: pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati, evaṁ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā
anya-e0105n1:21_4: uttarena nivattā. Tasmā taṁ upavattananti vuccatī’’ti saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.186; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.198 –
anya-e0105n1:22_0: Paccakkhato diṭṭhassa viya pakāsanampi dissateva. Tampi pana porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi bhāsāparivattanamattamevāti
anya-e0105n1:22_1: gahetabbaṁ, tādisāya atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya mahāmahindattherakālatoyeva pabhuti vuttāya
anya-e0105n1:23_0: [Ga) punapi tena ‘‘uṇhassāti aggisantāpassa, tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo’’ti
anya-e0105n1:23_2: pākaṭoyevā’’ti ca hīḷetvā ‘‘indiyaraṭṭhe pana uttaradesesu gimhakāle vatthacchādanarahitā
anya-e0105n1:23_3: mānusakāyacchavi sūriyasantāpena ekaṁsato dayhati, taṁ na jānanti dakkhiṇaindiyadesikā’’ti
anya-e0105n1:23_4: tatiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ daḷhatarabhāvena dassitaṁ. Tattha pana yadi ‘‘sūriyasantāpena ekaṁsato
anya-e0105n1:23_5: dayhatī’’ti etaṁ ujukato sūriyarasmisantāpeneva daḍḍhabhāvaṁ sandhāya vucceyya, evaṁ
anya-e0105n1:23_6: sati ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānanti pade ātapasaddena samānatthattā na
anya-e0105n1:23_7: yuttameva. Yadi pana sūriyasantāpasañjātena uṇhautunā daḍḍhabhāvaṁ sandhāya vucceyya,
anya-e0105n1:23_8: evaṁ sati uttaraindiyadesesu, aññattha ca tādisesu atiuṇhaṭṭhānesu sūriyasantāpasañjātassa
anya-e0105n1:23_9: uṇhautuno paṭighātāya cīvaraṁ senāsanañca paṭisevīyatīti ayamattho na na yutto. Tathā
anya-e0105n1:25_0: Sā pana visuddhimagge padatthasaṁvaṇṇanā porāṇasuttantaṭṭhakathāhi āgatā bhaveyya.
anya-e0105n1:25_1: Tathā hi vuttaṁ papañcasūdaniyā nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ
anya-e0105n1:25_2: (1, 58) ‘‘uṇhanti cettha aggisantāpova veditabbo, sūriyasantāpavasena panetaṁ vatthu
anya-e0105n1:25_3: vutta’’nti. Ettha ca sacāyamattho ācariyena attano mativasena vutto assa, tassa vatthussa
anya-e0105n1:25_4: porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttabhāvañca tassā atthasaṁvaṇṇanāya attano matibhāvañca yuttabhāvañca
anya-e0105n1:25_5: pakāseyya. Ācariyo hi yattha yattha porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu avuttatthaṁ visesetvā dasseti,
anya-e0105n1:25_6: tattha tattha tādisaṁ ñāpakavacanampi pakāsetiyeva, yathā sumaṅgalavilāsiniyaṁ (1,
anya-e0105n1:25_7: 72) ‘‘ettha āṇattiyanissaggiyathāvarāpi payogā yujjanti, aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā
anya-e0105n1:25_8: vīmaṁsitvā gahetabbā’’ti vacanaṁ, yathā ca papañcasūdaniyaṁ (1, 30) ‘‘avicāritametaṁ
anya-e0105n1:25_9: porāṇehi, ayaṁ pana attano matī’’ti vacanaṁ. Na cettha kiñcipi ñāpakavacanaṁ pakāsitaṁ.
anya-e0105n1:25_10: Tasmā ‘‘yadetaṁ ‘uṇhassāti aggisantāpassā’ti ca, ‘uṇhanti cettha aggisantāpova veditabbo’ti
anya-e0105n1:26_1: saṁvaṇṇento ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.350 buddhaghoso ‘magadhavideharaṭṭhānaṁ antare gaṅgāya
anya-e0105n1:26_2: nadiyā majjhe vālukatthaladīpakā atthī’ti saddahati maññe. Buddhaghosena pana diṭṭhagaṅgā
anya-e0105n1:26_3: sīhaḷadīpe mahāveligaṅgāyeva, na pana indiyaraṭṭhikānaṁ seṭṭhasammatā mahāgaṅgāti
anya-e0105n1:26_4: pākaṭoyevāyamattho’’ti catutthaṁ kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Taṁ pana idāni mahāgaṅgāya majjhe
anya-e0105n1:26_5: tasmiṁ ṭhāne tādisaṁ dīpakaṁ adisvā ‘‘pubbepi evameva bhaveyyā’’ti ekaṁsato gahetvā
anya-e0105n1:26_6: vuttavacanamattameva. Nadiyo pana sabbadāpi tenevākārena tiṭṭhantīti na sakkā gahetunti
anya-e0105n1:26_7: pākaṭoyevāyamattho. Tasmā yathā pubbe tassa gopālassa kāle tasmiṁ ṭhāne majjhe gaṅgāya
anya-e0105n1:26_8: tādisā dīpakā saṁvijjamānā ahesuṁ, tatheva porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu esa attho saṁvaṇṇito,
anya-e0105n1:26_9: tadeva ca vacanaṁ ācariyena bhāsāparivattanaṁ katvā pakāsitanti evameva gahetabbaṁ.
